name: Nike Air Max 1 '87 EA Sports Madden NFL 25
Nike Air Max 1 '87 Photon Dust Wolf Grey

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 '87 Photon Dust Wolf Grey brings a sophisticated update to Nike's age-old classic. It blends soft grey hues with premium textures and pays homage to the original 1987 design, offering modern touches for a refreshed appeal.

The Photon Dust Wolf Grey Air Max 1 '87 by Nike combines a mesh base with suede overlays to create a layered look in Photon Dust, Wolf Grey, and Smoke Grey tones. The signature wavy mudguard is made from premium suede. Subtle white accents on the midsole and Nike branding complement the tonal design, while the outsole features a rubber finish. This edition mirrors the innovative look and feel of the first Air Max, introduced in 1987 with visible air cushioning for added comfort.

One thing we, the experts, like about the Nike Air Max 1 '87 Photon Dust Wolf Grey is its use of soft suede and breathable mesh. Originally released on 5th July 2024, this pair retailed for $140​.​

name: Nike Air Max 1 Light Iron Ore Flat Pewter

details.colorway: Summit White/Light Iron Ore/Light Orewood Brown/Flat Pewter

name: Nike Air Max 1 '87 Sesame Leopard (Women's)

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 '87 Sesame Leopard (Women's) is a shoe for women designed for performance running with Air Max technology.

This iteration of the Nike Air Max 1 ‘87 is constructed with a breathable and lightweight mesh upper in an off-white coconut milk color. Suede panels cross the upper, providing a layered design. Sesame tan suede overlays appear under the laces and cross the sides of the shoe, adding support, while the same color suede also forms the heel counter. A leopard-print suede mudguard starts on the inner forefoot and wraps all the way around to the heel, adding a bold look. The Nike swoosh appears on each side over the suede overlays in Velvet Brown, and the heel features a Nike Air logo. The tongue also sports a Nike Air Max logo patch. An off-white rubber outsole with visible Air Max units under the heel rounds out the look.

What we like best about this sneaker is the way the leopard print complements the tan suede overlays. The Nike Air Max 1 '87 Sesame Leopard (Women's) was released on September 6, 2023, for $160.

name: Nike Air Max 1 '87 SP Supreme Black White

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 '87 SP Supreme Black White is a leather sneaker with a monochrome Black upper, featuring an overlaid construction. The White Swoosh appears from underneath a Black overlay embroidered with World Famous branding in White script. The Swoosh in White accents the mudguard. The tongue displays Nike Air Max branding and the Supreme red box logo. A Supreme branded silver dubrae and visible Air unit in the Black midsole finish the aesthetic.

Athletic wear brand Nike has become the world’s largest sneaker producer thanks to its iconic styles like the Air Max 1, which debuted in 1987. American skateboarding and lifestyle brand Supreme is known for their collaborations and art world inspiration. Therefore, it’s no surprise that Supreme worked with Nike on an exclusive Air Max 1 ‘87, which was designed by Tinker Hatfield and inspired by the visible construction of Paris’ Centre Pompidou.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the Air Max 1 ‘87 is its nuanced branding, which balances its minimalism. The Nike Air Max 1 '87 SP Supreme Black White released on March 20, 2025, and retailed at $170.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Coconut Milk Burgundy Crush Navy

details.description:
Smart and stylish are the first words that spring to mind when looking at the Nike Air Max 1 Coconut Milk Burgundy Crush Navy. It's a wonderful balance between athletic appeal and understated fashionability.

The colorway sounds like an exotic cocktail, and this shoe definitely does it justice. The milky leather and textile upper comes with a contrasting burgundy Swoosh, with a navy-blue mudguard above the rubber sole made from supple suede. The advanced cushioning technology caused an instant sensation when the model first came out.

We've loved these trainers since the original was released in the Eighties. They were the first shoes that featured the now iconic exposed Nike Max Air unit in their heels, which will always make them special. The premium materials offer excellent durability, and you can't go wrong with the classic styling. The Nike Air Max 1 Coconut Milk Burgundy Crush Navy was released on July 9, 2024, retailed at $140.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Olympic

details.description:
Released ahead of the 2024 Paris Olympics, the Nike Air Max 1 Olympic decks out the Air Max 1 silhouette with details inspired by the Olympic Games.

The Olympic Nike Air Max 1 embodies the spirit of Team USA, with a white base and patriotic accents in obsidian-blue and red. A metallic-gold Swoosh logo graces the side panel and represents the drive to achieve Olympic gold. Classic color blocking on the upper pays homage to the original Air Max 1, while the obsidian mudguard takes notes from the OG Obsidian colorway. The upper construction consists of a mesh base with Light Smoke Grey overlays near the rear and midfoot. Pops of red stand out on the eyelets, the tongue’s logo tag, and the NIKE AIR branding on the heel.

Our experts like how this sneaker subtly celebrates the 2024 Olympics and Team USA through colors instead of motifs or bold lettering. The Nike Air Max 1 Olympic was released on June 17, 2024, and sold for $150.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Anniversary Green

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Anniversary Green features a white, Evergreen Aura, and gray leather and mesh upper, with white acting as a background that feeds into Evergreen Aura mudguards and gray overlays. From there, an "Air Max" midsole with exposed pods sits atop a two-toned outsole and slight black accents for bordering to complete the design.

The Nike Air Max 1 Anniversary Green released in July of 2020 and retailed for $140. The Air Max 1 Anniversary Green re-released in 2024.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023)

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023) is an updated version of the original Nike Air Max 1 Urawa. The OG model was launched in 2004 as part of a collaboration between Nike and one of the biggest football clubs in Japan, the Urawa Dragons.

While the original Urawa only retailed in Japan, the 2023 version was sold in the US. The 2023 Air Max Urawa variation features a mostly white colorway of Pure Platinum, White, Black, Sport Red, and Summit White, unlike its predecessor which came in a bright Jersey Red, White, Silver, and Deep Red. Other elements mirror the 2004 Urawa, including the placement of the overlays, the use of mesh in the upper, and the visible Air Sole unit in the midsole.

Our experts love the addition of bright red details on the eyelets near the collar and on the Air Sole unit to honor the original Urawa. The Nike Air Max 1 Urawa (2023) was released on October 3, 2023, and retailed at $160.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll

details.description:
Celebrate 20 years of Patta with the Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll, which released in 2024 and pays homage to the 5th anniversary model which released in 2009.

This sneaker features a grey, white, and green upper with a white midsole. This sneaker is highly coveted by sneakerheads due to it's similarly to the 5th anniversary model that released in 2009, that has similar color blocking. The Patta and Air Max branding can be seen on the tongue in white and green stitching. We love this sneaker due to its bold colors and OG references, making for a classic sneaker that you truly cannot go wrong with.

The Nike Air Max 1 Patta 20th Anniversary Chlorophyll released on September 13th, 2024, for a retail price of $160.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Sail Ironstone

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Sail Ironstone features a mix of four different hues: sail, ironstone, white, and rattan.

This Nike Air Max 1 sneaker in Sail Ironstone features a white mesh base with off-white suede equivalents. Nike's Swoosh insignia appears in brown over the sides of this shoe. The small Swoosh emblem on the lateral toes is also presented in brown. It also boasts cream-colored Air midsole units and a white lacing system that complements its appearance.

The Nike Air Max 1 Sail Ironstone was made available on November 24th, 2022, with a retail price of $150.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Athletic Department Deep Royal Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Athletic Department Deep Royal Blue presents a subtly elegant shoe with a classic design that delivers high-performance capabilities and style that fits in anywhere.
​
The Athletic Department Deep Royal Blue iteration of the Nike Air Max 1 features an upper with a base constructed from white mesh that keeps the shoe lightweight and provides breathability. Suede in shades of gray overlay the forefoot, eye stays, side panel, and heel, providing an aesthetic element as well as structure. A dark blue suede mud guard surrounds the shoe and sports an iridescent mini swoosh. The same blue is echoed in a sock liner and the side-panel Nike swoosh that sneaks beneath the heel.
​
What our experts enjoy most about this shoe is the sole unit that revolutionized sneakers. Visible Air is housed in the white foam midsole. The outsole is constructed from black rubber lugged for traction and white rubber vented for midsole expansion. The Nike Air Max 1 Athletic Department Deep Royal Blue was released on September 7, 2023, for a retail price of $150.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Essential Light Bone/Psychic Blue
Nike Air Max 1 Keep Rippin Stop Slippin 2.0

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Keep Rippin Stop Slippin 2.0, originally introduced in 2008, makes a return featuring a gray mesh foundation complemented by off-white suede overlays along the medial side and black hairy suede mudguards.

The Air Max 1 Keep Rippin Stop Slippin 2.0 introduces a modern twist to the original by integrating safari print onto the mudguard and Swoosh, achieved through the use of long hairy suede. Vast Gray emerges as the primary color for the mesh base, while Pearl White embellishes the suede overlays on the midfoot, heel, and vamp. Black details stand out on the lace set and sections of hairy suede, with reddish cedar accents appearing on the mini Swoosh located on the mudguard, sock liner, and the embroidery of Keep Rip'n Stop Slip'n on the heel.

The standout characteristic of the Nike Air Max 1 Keep Rippin Stop Slippin 2.0 are the embroidered phrases "Keep Rip’n" and "Stop Slip’n" in red on the heel. The sneaker debuted for $160 on November 28th, 2023.

name: Nike Air Max 1 '86 PRM Powerwall BRS

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 '86 PRM Powerwall BRS merges retro-inspired aesthetics with modern materials. This refreshed version of the classic Air Max brings you bold visual appeal and improved comfort by combining age-old designs with premium materials and technology.

The Powerwall BRS Air Max 1 '86 PRM by Nike comes with a mesh base layered with suede-and-leather accents in a striking mix of brown, green, and bright orange. The signature "Nike AIR" branding appears prominently on the heel. The visible Air unit, first introduced in 1987, is in the updated midsole to make sure you get the right cushioning. The Powerwall series celebrates Nike's most impactful designs.

Something we love about the Nike Air Max 1 '86 PRM Powerwall BRS is its oversized Air bubble, a tribute to the original model, as well as the creative way the colors are blended. This sneaker retailed at $170 when released on November 7, 2024.

name: Nike Air Max 1 '87 SP Supreme Triple White

details.description:
The Supreme Triple White Nike Air Max 1 ’87 SP debuts in pure white premium leather with snakeskin‑debossed Swoosh, "World Famous" embroidery on the heel, and co‑branding on lace locks and tongue labels.

The Supreme Triple White Air Max 1 ’87 SP by Nike comes with textured leather overlays in triple white with an embossed snakeskin pattern Swoosh and "World Famous" heel embroidery. It hinges on a foam midsole with a visible Air unit, premium foam cushioning, and a rubber outsole. A brushed knit–lined tongue, co‑branded lace locks, Supreme‑branded dubraes, and co‑branded footbed help finish off the design. Nike began as Blue Ribbon Sports in 1964 and rebranded in 1971.

One of the things we really like about The Supreme Triple White Nike Air Max 1 ’87 SP is the Max Air cushioning, which maintains steady foam resilience. We also value the waffle rubber outsole with flex grooves for adaptable traction on varied surfaces. It retailed at $170 when it was released on March 20, 2025.

name: Nike Air Max 180 Summit White Concord

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 180 Summit White Concord is a reissue of the iconic Air Max 180 designed by Tinker Hatfield in 1991. In comparison to other reissues, this shoe more closely resembles the OG sneaker with its understated design and retro-inspired colorway.

The Summit White Concord Nike Air Max 180 is outfitted with a Summit White base and accents in metallic gold and Bright Concord. Grape-purple Concord appears on the midsole wedge, the outsole, the collar, and the flat tongue, while metallic gold stands out on the Swoosh logos and the "NIKE AIR" embroidery on the heel. The upper construction combines suede and mesh, drawing inspiration from the original shoe. However, the sneaker includes several modern upgrades, including a larger 180-degree Air unit underfoot.

Our experts like the way the gold Swoosh pays tribute to Team USA’s men’s basketball victory at the 1992 Barcelona Olympics. The Nike Air Max 180 Summit White Concord was released on August 7, 2024, and sold for $150.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Essential Off Noir Vast Grey
Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Camo Light Lemon Twist

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Camo Light Lemon Twist takes the classic silhouette that debuted in 1986 and gives it a Camo makeover that pops with hits of vibrant color.

The upper of this classic sneaker is composed of Camo-patterned loose-weave mesh, with hints of orange detectable beneath the mesh on the toe box. Camo-printed canvas forms overlays at the mud guard and all over the upper. A thick Light Lemon Twist-colored Nike Swoosh courses across the side panel, adding a splash of brightness, while the orange insole adds a note of rich color. A dark brown foam midsole provides cushioning and houses a visible cassette of Air under the heel. A black waffle patterned outsole completes the look of this shoe.

Our favorite aspect of this sneaker is the branding embroidered in the Light Lemon Twist on the heels. One heel says Nike, while the other heel sports a Swoosh. The Nike Air Max 1 '86 OG Camo Light Lemon Twist was released on May 30, 2024, for $150 retail.

name: Nike Air Max 1 Essential Psychic Blue

details.description:
The Nike Air Max 1 Essential Psychic Blue is an athletic shoe that subtly pays homage to the New York Knicks team via its colorway.
       
This iteration of the Air Max 1 Essential is made with a light Psychic Blue mesh upper for breathability. The mesh stands out mostly on the toe box, peeks through the sides, and around the ankle collar. University Blue suede overlays cross the upper atop the toe box, on the sides, and as the heel counter for support, while a strip of Deep Royal blue leather forms the mudguard and the small Swooshes that adorn the sides. Bright orange Nike Air branding appears both on the heel and the tongue, and the top eyestays also get a bright orange hue. The thick white midsole contains Air Max units also accented with orange, while a blue and black outsole completes the look.

This shoe has hits of bright orange, which are eye-catching against the blue backdrop. The Nike Air Max 1 Essential Psychic Blue was released on January 2, 2025, for $140.
